mapper.select: SELECT * FROM travel_plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM travel_plans WHERE is_public = true ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_plans (user_id, title, departure_region_code, arrival_region_code, departure_date, arrival_date, adult_count, child_count, has_pet, template_id, is_public, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{departureRegionCode}, #{arrivalRegionCode}, #{departureDate}, #{arrivalDate}, #{adultCount}, #{childCount}, #{hasPet}, #{templateId}, #{isPublic}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE travel_plans SET title = #{title}, departure_region_code = #{departureRegionCode}, arrival_region_code = #{arrivalRegionCode}, departure_date = #{departureDate}, arrival_date = #{arrivalDate}, adult_count = #{adultCount}, child_count = #{childCount}, has_pet = #{hasPet}, template_id = #{templateId}, is_public = #{isPublic}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE plan_id = #{planId}
